name: vue-carousel

scripts.docs:build: npm run build && rm -rf ./docs/public && mkdir ./docs/public/ && cd ./docs/public/ && git init && git remote add origin git@github.com:SSENSE/vue-carousel.git && git fetch && git checkout -f gh-pages && cd .. && npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/hexo clean && ./node_modules/.bin/hexo generate
